item.description:
This is an easy 2.5 mile hike that includes a relatively scenic view from the summit of Lookout Mountain (744 ft.). Portions of the trail include the Shenipsit Trail. This forested hike started out as a Boy Scout hike I was recently asked to cover and I decided to open it up to the Meetup Group too. I expect only a small number of scouts attending so there won't be any crowding or distractions from the beauty of the hike.

The hike is anticipated to last 1.5 hours and rise 350 feet. Overall the hike should be done at about 9:30 AM. No lunch plans are included in this hike. No online trail map is available. A map can be found as hike #6 in the "50 Hikes in Connecticut" book by the Connecticute Forest and Parks Association.

The leader on this hike is Kevin S so please direct questions on the hike to him.

Directions from Hartford:
* Take I-84 E to I-384
* Take Exit 4 off of I-384 (Highland St.)
* From the end of the Exit ramp, right onto Spring St.
* Go about 0.2 mile to small parking lot at the bottom of the hill on your left.

item.name: Hike to Highland Springs and Lookout Mountain in Manchester CT
